### Logging Hours

**Working Times**
You are free to work at the most suitable time for you. Please try and answer within 2 days whether you can or cannot take on an assigned task, providing a timeline if you can take it on.

**Tracking Hours**
Please use [this Google Sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14mOZh3M0XvYzte4neq2CknvnU29HckUL/edit?rtpof=true&sd=true&gid=853702177#gid=853702177) in the [Logging working hours folder](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/15R3RZ4DiHdWOtbbj2w7dd1W2E2N_XkR_?usp=sharing) to log your hours. 

Follow this steps: 

- Make a copy of this template
- Save the template offline for your usage
- Be responsible in entering your working hours
